title: Few questions :)
body:
A Question i have for a rioter or someone that knows is changing your HUD against the rules i have no clue about changing stuff but I've found a cool green looking one i wanna use for the new hud and wanted to know Thanks :)

AND

I'm thinking of changing my name to something about Rengar and need ideas I'm thinking of Predator kitty  or OneShotLord but i know there are people that think of really cool names and yes i play anivia but not as much as i use to and its starting to get annoying when people say why you no play anivia and other stuff. 

Thanks again aha :D

replies.body: Should change your name to eggnivia so you can eggnivia while you eggnivia
It appears that Riot is beginning to crack down on modifications and 3rd Party Applications, so I would refrain from making any changes that could be seen as a violation of the Terms of Use.

[Here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/ao7rYcrT-riot-i-hope-youre-not-okay-with-this?show=flat&comment=0012)'s what Riot announced regarding 3rd party programs, this was a response to LoLWiz but it applies to any 3rd party program.

Essentially, you need to find out if it's a game-mod or overlay. If it's a game-mod there's a high chance you will be banned.

You'll not get banned for changing your hud. I did before and it did not affect me in anyway xP

You can even put a custom skin on your champion. I saw a streamer put a basic caitlyn skin into yoko littner. However putting custom skins on means only you can see it not other players.
